an2.21-31:21.1.3: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato na passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti.
an2.21-31:21.2.3: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti.
an2.21-31:22.1.3: Duṭṭho vā dosantaro, saddho vā duggahitena.
an2.21-31:22.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:23.1.3: Yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti, yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:23.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantīti.
an2.21-31:23.2.3: Yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti, yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:23.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:24.1.3: Yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ nītattho suttantoti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ neyyattho suttantoti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:24.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:25.1.3: Yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ neyyattho suttantoti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ nītattho suttantoti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:25.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:26.1.1: “Paṭicchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:26.2.1: Appaṭicchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:27.1.1: “Micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:28.1.1: “Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:30.1.1: “Dvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamāno araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevāmi.
an2.21-31:30.1.3: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sampassamāno, pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamāno.
an2.21-31:30.1.4: Ime kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamāno araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevāmī”ti.
an2.21-31:31.1.12: Rāgupakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā, bhikkhave, cittaṃ na vimuccati, avijjupakkiliṭṭhā vā paññā na bhāvīyati.
an2.21-31:31.1.13: Iti kho, bhikkhave, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttī”ti.
